resp = client.indices.put_index_template(
    name="my-metrics",
    index_patterns=[
        "metrics-mymetrics-*"
    ],
    priority=200,
    data_stream={},
    template={
        "settings": {
            "index.mode": "time_series"
        },
        "mappings": {
            "properties": {
                "attributes": {
                    "type": "passthrough",
                    "priority": 10,
                    "time_series_dimension": True,
                    "properties": {
                        "host.name": {
                            "type": "keyword"
                        }
                    }
                },
                "cpu": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "time_series_metric": "counter"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="metrics-mymetrics-test",
    document={
        "@timestamp": "2020-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
        "attributes": {
            "host.name": "foo",
            "zone": "bar"
        },
        "cpu": 10
    },
)
